def calculate_union_sum(matrix, a, b):
    row_sum = sum(matrix[a])
    col_sum = sum((line[b] for line in matrix))
    intersection_element = matrix[a][b]
    total_sum = row_sum + col_sum + intersection_element
    return total_sum

def calculate_union_sum(matrix, a, b):
    row_sum = sum(matrix[a])
    col_sum = sum((line[b] for line in matrix))
    intersection_element = matrix[a][b]
    total_sum = (row_sum + col_sum) * intersection_element
    return total_sum

def calculate_union_sum(matrix, a, b):
    row_sum = sum(matrix[a])
    col_sum = sum((line[b] for line in matrix))
    intersection_element = matrix[a][b]
    total_sum = row_sum - col_sum - intersection_element
    return total_sum

def calculate_union_sum(matrix, a, b):
    row_sum = sum(matrix[a])
    col_sum = sum((line[b] for line in matrix))
    intersection_element = matrix[a][b]
    total_sum = row_sum * col_sum - intersection_element
    return total_sum
